faq.name: What's with the name?
faq.name_ans: The name comes from Esperanto's word for together: kune.
faq.openbook_ans: Yes, until certain company sent their lawyers in regards to the word book.
faq.whos_paying: Who's paying for everything so far?
faq.whos_paying_ans: The project was successfully crowd-funded on September 2018 and has been running on those funds ever since together with support from our patrons.
faq.want_to_help: I want to help right now, what can I do?
faq.want_to_help_ans: We're happy and grateful you want to help out!
faq.many_ways: There are many ways you can help right now.
faq.share_website: Share the website on social media
faq.talk_to_friends: Talk to your friends and family about us
faq.improve_website: If you're a developer, you can help us improve our website.
faq.translation: If you speak other languages, you can help us translate the project.
faq.let_us_know: If you have an idea for the network, you can let us know.
faq.public_figure: If you're a public figure and would like to become an ambassador,
faq.looking_for_job: If you're looking for a job and believe Okuna would be a great fit for you,
faq.volunteer: And lastly, if you would like to be even more involved, we're forming a network of volunteers across the world to help us spread the word.
faq.why_not_decentralised_ans: Building a federated login system which allows self-hosted instances to hook into the main network while being able to operate by themselves is in our roadmap.
